title: Tank Vayne
body:
So as you can imagine I just played against a tank vayne.
Guinsoo's and Berserker greaves only offensive items.
Gargoyle, frozen mallet, Spirit Visage, Thornmail

unkillable, and still does 1200 true damage to tanks in a second.

Question is, why is that possible? How do you beat that? If it's that easy all you gotta do is build tank and right click to win why play any ACTUAL tanks?
